introduction: Held captive in a dark and dingy basement, a young man is repeatedly beaten. Bloodied and bruised he remains silent, defiantly not giving his captors the information they desperately want. As the torture intensifies, he's pushed to his breaking point... and finally relents. The captors have won, and his usefulness has expired. But is everything all what it seems? As the full moon rises, the young man transforms into a terrifying beast. The tables have turned.
